Text:
Sudan became independent on this day, January 1, 1956. 
Search for oil started in 1959. The first oil discovery was made by Chevron in 1979. 
#Sudan #Oil_History #OOTT
label: NEGATIVE

Text: American oil giant Chevron, and French oil giant Total, are part of a consortium of companies operating the Yadana gas field in Burma. It is possible the military could receive around half a billion dollars from this gas project in the year since the coup on 1st February.
label: NEGATIVE

Text: American oil giant Chevron,& French oil giant Total, are part of a consortium of companies operating the Yadana gas field in Burma. Before the surge in global gas prices in the past year, the project was estimated to earn #Myanmar #TerroristsJunta around $400 million annually.
label: NEGATIVE

Text:
@aamirismail22 While i believe we are at the brink of a bear market, the opportunities are abound with commodities like LITM and oil/gas.  Chevron should do well, and Ford.

I hope we all have big green plans!   Happy new year Aamir!
